Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:CallFar><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Sooo<sp:5:1:0> FAST!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Amazing!<sp:5:0:0> Those arrows zipped by
so quick, it left my head spinning!
Talk44:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>All right, time to test your speed!<sp:5:0:0>
So get ready quick!
Talk17: <sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Happy_01>Here's your prize, happy face and all.
Talk46: <sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Think>Sorry, but you're short on rupees there.
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Think_00>You don't become the fastest person in
the world without a lotta practice.

I bet you'll be able to shoot for an even
better time! Give it another try!
Talk19: <sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Think>Your time is up!<sp:0:4:0>But I can't let things end like this!
Talk48:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:TalkPositive>With your skills, you might even be able
to beat <clr:0000>Kabetta<clr:ffff>'s course.

If you're curious, he's up at the <clr:0000>peak of<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>.
Talk49:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Think_00>Time's up.<sp:0:4:0>If ya wanna rock this, ya gotta take time
to prepare.<sp:0:4:0>Try out different bows, <clr:0000>modify<clr:ffff> the mine
cart, and get ready for your biggest
smile yet!
I'd love to see ya take another shot at it!
Talk50:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Happy_00>Since you abandoned the game midway
through last time, I'll give ya one more
play for free!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk51:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Happy_00>I want you to feel the joy of zippy,
heart-pounding, <clr:0000>rapid-fire shooting<clr:ffff>!
That's why your next round's free!<sp:5:0:0>
So, are ya ready?
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You beat both my brothers' courses!
You're pretty incredible, you know that?

Watching you handle that mine cart gave
me an idea for a course of my own.

I'm gonna set it up...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>at <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>In fact, I think I'll go set it up now! Come
give it a try when ya can.
Talk52:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>Oh, and let me give ya some arrows for
next time.
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:CallFar><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Faaastest<sp:5:1:0> EVER!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


A new record! You blazed through that
faster than I've ever seen!
Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:CallFar_00>From noon till noon, it's smiiiles all
the time!

Thanks for visiting Mine-Cart Land,<sp:5:0:0>
brought to you by YunoboCo.
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:CallFar><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Suuuper<sp:5:1:0> FAST!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Wowza!<sp:5:0:0> You're even faster'n me!
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:CallFar><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Ultraaa<sp:5:1:0> FAST!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Terrific!<sp:5:0:0> You were so fast, I couldn't even
track where ya were!
Talk29:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You get all that? If you didn't, I'll try
smilin' harder. Maybe that'll help.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Greeting_01>My game's a little different from Bayge's—
it's custom crafted for a slightly
tougher challenge!
It'll put your <clr:0000>rapid-fire shooting <clr:ffff>to
the test! You in?
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>Put the mine cart on the track, <clr:0000>get in<clr:ffff>,
<clr:0000>and get goin'<clr:ffff>!
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:TalkPositive_01>What's there to think about?<sp:5:0:0> Spend too
long thinkin' and you'll miss out on
the fun!
Talk32: <sp:3:0:2:0200>If you're not ready, stay outta the cart.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>Fast response time you've got there.


Good stuff! Let's speed through the rules!
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Happy_00>This round's free, and I'll even throw in
some arrows for maximum fun!
Talk34: <sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Happy_00>Then let's go!<sp:5:0:0> I'll get the targets ready.
Talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:CallFar><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Sooo<sp:5:1:0> FAST!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Fantastic! <sp:5:0:0>You cleared that course in the
blink of an eye!
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive_00>If there's anything you don't get, ask me!
I just hope you like your answers served
with a smile!
Talk37:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Happy_00>If ya wanna play something laid-back,
talk to <clr:0000>Bayge<clr:ffff>!

If you're lookin' for something that packs
a punch, I recommend <clr:0000>Kabetta's<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Death
Mountain course<clr:ffff>!
My course is smack dab in the middle—
not too easy and not too hard.
Talk67:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Hang on a sec! I was so stunned,
I forgot to smile for ya!
Talk39:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>It's <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> to just play. But for
<clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>, you also get 10 arrows.
Talk40:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Huh? Aren't you playing Bayge's course
right now? You can only do one at a time!<sp:0:4:0>So once you're done with Bayge, come on
by for more fun and smiles!
Talk41:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Talk to one of my <clr:0000>brothers<clr:ffff> when ya
wanna play.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>I know they look a little intense, but they
mean well, really!
Talk42:
<sp:3:0:2:0200>Now go hop in the mine cart for some
high-speed thrills!
